summary: Over the course of my digital career, I've been a business systems analyst, technical content manager, subscriptions marketing manager, digital marketing consultant, content editor, web producer and project manager, social media strategist, spreadsheet analyst, copywriter, CMS specialist, and voice actor. I've learned that adaptability is key in this industry, and I excel at cross-functional roles that require diverse skillsets.

experience.title: Freelance Digital Marketing Consultant
responsibilities: Assist clients with B2C and B2B online marketing through the entire funnel
Optimize channels for conversion and retention
Make the best use of limited resources in SMBs
Focus on minimizing wasted revenue for subscription-based and SaaS clients

experience.title: Business Systems Analyst
responsibilities: Facilitate cross-office, cross-discipline and cross-agency collaboration
Manage and resolve critical issues proactively
Provide hands-on technical support and problem-solving
Work with diverse teams to solve complex business problems

experience.title: Subscriptions Marketing Manager
responsibilities: Implement best practice solutions for pricing and UX
Oversee marketing automation, payments, and customer service
Increase customer conversion rates by 200% and retention from 40% to 60%

experience.title: Digital Content Manager
responsibilities: Manage end-to-end project management for native advertising and content marketing campaigns
Produce and edit web content and graphics for various digital products
Conduct reporting, analytics, and process improvement across multiple platforms
